title: GJ on that dumb Yi buff riot
body:
Go ahead and play Yi if u want to climb, just get a guinsoo and a BoRK and thats it you won.
Why does riot likes to make champs that were actually fine without a buff meta again...
Requirements to play Master Yi: no brain
If some champs are not meta it's because people don't want to play them or they simply got tired of them and that's not a reason to give them a random buff out of nowhere.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
